film.title: Second Sight
film.summary: John Larroquette is the head of a detective agency that is hired to find a missing person, probably kidnapped. They employ the help of a mystic/psychic to help find the missing girl.

guestOne.name: Jessica St. Clair
guestOne.bio: The very talented and renowned American actress and improv comedian Jessica St. Clair is known best for her work in the NBC series, Best Friends Forever. Jessica St. Clair net worth is known best to have been sourced from her work in TV series and movies like Itâ€™s Complicated, Life As We Know It, Wanderlust, Labor Pains, Veep, and more. Jessica St. Clair IMDB profile has details of her awards, TV series, and movies.

results.episodeDescription: Jessica St. Clair (Womp It Up!, Playing House) joins Paul and Jason to discuss the 1989 comedy Second Sight starring John Larroquette and Bronson Pinchot. Recorded live in Boston, they talk about the cold open, Pinchot kissing everyone, and Larroquette looking miserable. Plus, Jessica reminds everyone of the Bronson Pinchot episode of Law & Order where he puts cocaine up his butt.
